website_summaries.verdict: When you won't have time to launder for a few days, this stick will help keep stains from setting in.
cons: You will have to remember to treat a while before your wash

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute BEST
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered I can buy the Spray 'n Wash Stain Remover again so I quickly bought it. This is undoubtably the BEST stain remover ever put on the market. I love that you can put it on a stain, throw the clothing item in the dirty clothes and when you do wash clothes, whenever that may be, the stain will be gone. I keep it right by the dirty clothes basket so I can use it whenever I need it. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: moose58

customer_reviews.title: Works well - hard to find... :)
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to find in brick and mortar stores. It works quite well - rub this stuff on the stain before wetting the fabric. Let it sit for a little bit, throw it in the washer and you're in business. This used to come in a different size/pkg in grocery and big box stores, but I can't find it anymore. Glad Amazon had it. Had to buy a 3-pack, but given how hard it is to find and how long it lasts, I'm good for years now!
customer_reviews.author: Carole B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stain stick.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes hard to find but works better than anything else I've tried. It takes out grass stains, cow manure and dried blood. Even if I have washed and dried a garment and find I missed treating a stain I just treat it then and launder it again with the next load. It works unbelievably well. I love being able to treat clothes and wash them later. And I've never had it fade something even though I apply and let sit.
customer_reviews.author: GSlover

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: In the "old" days, this was a fantastic product and then it was taken over by another company and went off the market. I then discovered it on Amazon and was thrilled to order it. It just does not work like it used to work. It makes me wonder if a key, expensive ingredient was left out this product when the takeover company took command.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...does not remove stains.  Formula has changed.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy...doesn’t work. The formula has changed and no longer removes stains. In the past, this was the stain remover that I’ve used for many years because it worked so well...not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BFRITZ50

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find this in any local stores any more, so I was happy to find it here. This is the best at getting out grease stains on clothes. I haven't found anything as good. Don't pre-treat khakis per the label's instructions. I'd also add, don't pre-treat turquoise colored clothing either. It can remove color from the fabric. For those clothes, I just rub a bunch on any stains right before in goes in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Stains are no longer a problem!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of use for this stain remover. simply rub in the paste let sit for a few minutes or hours and launder as usual. Worked well on grass, blood, food stains ~even old stains. Did not lighten the fabric. No dripping, no spilling and the concentrated formula works better than spray on products.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: I first started using when while waiting at the dry cleaner, I noticed an employee treating stains on incoming clothing. Hmmm, if it’s good enough for a dry cleaner!!! I’ve used it ever since. Our grocery store doesn’t carry it, so I order from Amazon now.
customer_reviews.author: TrishScott

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works better than any other stain stick I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works better than any other stain stick I have ever used...Been using it for 27 years. Forget the spray and wash spray ...doesnt really work but this stick will get off blood, grass, wine, ink etc. Wish it was easier to find and the price is now outrageous but I'll pay.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Stain Remover. Buy in bulk and have your kids keep one in their bedroom to treat their clothes right away.
customer_reviews.text: Best stain remover I've found. I really like the stick formula. I try to keep a stick in my bedroom so I can treat stains before they go in the dirty clothes hamper. I keep another stick in the laundry room in case I missed a stain. This formula gets out 99% of stains that I have encountered. It even typically works on stains that have already gone through the washer and dryer. I always thought that those stains would be set and would never come out. This product proved me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Azile68

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't do my laundry without this stuff. I use it to pretreat underarm stains among other things and it works every time. She to use on colors and delicate fabrics. No stains and no yellow underarms!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have never found any stain remover better than this one. I love that it is so easy to apply. You can apply it whenever, even when the fabric won't be washed for a few days. It has always removed all the stains, from baby's "mustard color accidents" to greasy table cloth. It's so small that I love to take it with me on trips. It really last a lot. I struggle to find it in the stores, so I was happy to find it on Amazon. This package comes with 3 of them. It will probably last me a good year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania

customer_reviews.title: Stain free!
customer_reviews.text: I use this laundry stain stick more as a preventative measure than to remove exiting stains. When I take off my shirts at night, I treat the underarms with this to prevent underarm stains. The stick works much like a stick deodorant. Using it daily as I do, it does not last as long as it would if you used it only to treat stains. A great product that seems to help save my clothes. I love the three-pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperFans

customer_reviews.title: Resolve rocks - meh on the stick
customer_reviews.text: I am a dedicated Resolve user but I don't love the deodorant stick application. It still doesn't cease to amaze me in terms of stain removing ability, but I plan to purchase the spray next time. I suppose these would be handy for sticking in a purse or car and maybe that is what they are primarily meant for. I would definitely grab one if I were going on a substantial out-of-town trip. Regardless, I find Resolve to be the best stain remover and we use it on almost everything between my five year old and husband. :)
customer_reviews.author: Montague Poe

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like strong perfume smells
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the "bomb"! If you don't like strong perfume smells, this is the product for you. It has no scent, unlike the spray version of the same brand, and it works on every stain I've ever encountered, including blood stains. You can apply, and let it sit without washing straight away. It's great packaging for travel. I can't live without this product for my laundry needs.
customer_reviews.author: cshakra

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry stain stick on the market!! By far!
customer_reviews.text: Best stain remover ever!! I love this product though it is hard to find in my local stores I can now get online!! Thank you for offering the discount on multiples. Great value and awesome quick delivery. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: shellrenee

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are shockingly effective and the only stain removers I bother with. They even remove old/set stains. And you can leave the treated clothes in the hamper for up to 7 days before washing. Miraculous product!
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: Works great on stains
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old stick of "Shout" that I had used for years. When it ran out, I was disappointed to discover that it was no longer available. It was with reservation that I tried Resolve instead. Much to my surprise and joy, I find it works as well as Shout did. It's great at getting out stains. I use it as soon as I note a stain; however, I sometimes don't wash the garment for a few more days. So far, every stain I've applied it to has come out.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This works great and a package of three is sure that you won't run out. I love that you can treat a stain and leave it for like 7 days before you wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Stains are OUT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product I use with my laundry detergent. The best part about this product is that if you aren't ready to do laundry yet, you can still use the Resolve Stain Remover on the stain and wait until you're ready...it does a great job and I am very happy with it. The only thing I would change is in the design. It is shaped like a man's deoderant, and I wish it was more rounded instead of oblong...but that's just my personal preference, the product itself does what it is supposed to do! Economical package of 3 is a good bargain too.
customer_reviews.author: PKL

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains perfectly
customer_reviews.text: this works so great. its a clothes saver really. i use it on all my shirt collars regularly and they always come out new. that was never the case when using just detergent. even though i use Tide which works great. this also works great on an coffee or soda spills. so convenient to just leave it one a few mins or a day or many days. basically whenever i put in a shirt for laundry i use this on it.
customer_reviews.author: mrnd23

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Been using Spray 'n Wash for years, and I just love it. It really works on tuff stains, and it's good at getting blood out of cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised and Satisfied with Efficacy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those purchases I made based on Amazon reviews after I could no longer find Shout in stores near me and after trying countless other brands. I decided to give Resolve a try after reading the positive reviews of its stain removing effectiveness. I'm happy with the results I'm getting with this stick. I rub some on stained areas and let it sit overnight before throwing it in the washer cycle. I've seen better results than I have in the past using the various other popular brands on the market. I also like the stick applicator and prefer this now to spray. I can get right onto any spot easier with the stick.
customer_reviews.author: I am C, Not X

customer_reviews.title: I like to have these sticks upstairs so I can treat ...
customer_reviews.text: This, for some reason has become hard to find. Our laundry room is in the basement and the natural light is dim. I like to have these sticks upstairs so I can treat spots as I take things off as I may not be able to see them in the laundry space. There are three sticks to this order which will last a long time. I actually cannot remember the time I bought the previous stick and I never finished it, my daughter took it to school with her.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseW

customer_reviews.title: Convient, reliable, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great stain treater. I keep one in my house, one in my camper & gave my husband one to keep at work. This three pack is a really good deal. I’ve been using this stuff for over 30 years. Works great & it’s portable. This sooner you smear it on the stain the better it will work.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Clothes saver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I have a 2 month old and for those of you who have had kids know that nasty poop explosions happen! I've tried several other products until I found this one. It's the only one that can get rid of those yellow stains. I don't know where I bougt it first but I never found it again at the grocery store so I'm glad I could find it here. You are a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: monica vallina

customer_reviews.title: Accept no substitutes.
customer_reviews.text: Sovereign cure for grease stains (and really any household stain). When I couldn't find these at the corner store I came here.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ehren

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: With 3 children ages 8 and younger, I always come home from our lake-front vacation with their stained clothing that never comes fully clean regardless of my spray-and-scrub efforts. This year, I took a tube of Resolve. Each time my children took off dirty clothes, I rubbed spots with the stick and tossed them in the laundry bag. When I threw my laundry straight into the washer after a week, every article of clothing came out clean. It even took out pomegranate stains!
customer_reviews.author: DebbieP

customer_reviews.title: The only one i will buy now
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stain remover i will buy! I actually buy them in bulk when i travel to the states and bring them home because i cant get them in Canada. They work on everything. Like...this will remove grease stains that have already been through the dryer. FOR REAL! I just rub it on the stain and either throw it in the hamper or straight into the machine. Works every time. Nothing gets past this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MamaJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Removes all stains always
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gets any stain out of anything. Black grease on white check after first wash, don’t dry, reapply and rewash, the stain will come out.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Stain Remover Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise find for me. I ordered it based on a coupon & haven't stopped ordering it since. The product works better than almost any other stain remover I have used. It has gotten makeup off pillow cases and towels, turned dirty socks white again & saved many items we thought might be permanently stained. Another perk is that it travels very well--no need to worry about a leaking bottle. The fact that it is super inexpensive is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyinWI

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like to have this on hand while camping or at work. It works well and you can easily treat a stain anywhere,
customer_reviews.author: Skippy B

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Virtually makes all my stains disappear except greasy/ oily ones. It is easy to apply, and I also love that you can let it sit until the next load of laundry instead of having to wash right away. Will be purchasing again when we are out!
customer_reviews.author: thegirlyonfire

customer_reviews.title: This works the best for pre-treating stains
customer_reviews.text: this works the best in pre-treating stains. Takes a bit of time to rub into clothing but item can sit for a week after being treated and it will remove any new stains.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Upton

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Really works to take out stains if used properly. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M

customer_reviews.title: Mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST stain remover there is. Been using it for years. I'm a mother of 12 so I use a lot of this stuff! Even takes grease spots out of clothes. I use it for carpet spots too. Use a damp towel, rub the towel across top of the stick lightly and then rub the stain. Dip the towel in water and rub the spot again. Repeat until stain is gone. I spot clean my couches this way also!
customer_reviews.author: Latin Mass Lover

customer_reviews.title: Classic Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: Spray in Wash has been around forever. Whenever I get a stain I wash it with cold water and apply it whether I am washing it right then or not. If I am washing it right away I wait 5 minutes and toss it in. If I am washing it later I reapply and wait 5 minutes before washing. Sometimes it will take a second wash but as long as you don't dry it, I have never had a stain stay.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kinue

customer_reviews.title: Potential Scam; Only Received 1 of 3
customer_reviews.text: Only received one of three. It’s possible this is an error but this is also a common scam on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amozing

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. Usually just by it at target but needed to fill my prime box and its a bit cheaper here. I love this stuff. Get srid of most stains. Some need a little extra. Goes on nicely and doesn't leave a weird residue on the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: D-nae

customer_reviews.title: We love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This really helps get out the stains. I don't like the sprays because I don't like to breathe in chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: genealover

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm on delicate fabric
customer_reviews.text: This got a large grease stain out of the delicate, sheer overskirt of an expensive sequined dress that was not machine washable or dry cleanable! I applied the stain remover stick to the stained area as directed and left it there for several days. I then handwashed the skirt of the dress and hung it to dry and the stain was gone. Previous to this I had tried spot removers without success.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: Solves stained collars
customer_reviews.text: If you have your shirts laundered, this is a life saver. You can put it on when you take your shirt off. It can stay on for days without harming the fabric, unlike spray versions. Was going to throw a number of shirts away before I found this. Note, if your collars are really stained, it will take a few wash cycles to get them completely clean again. But keep using and your shirts will soon look like new again.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Has yet to fail me on stains.
customer_reviews.text: Best way to treat your spots before throwing it into the laundry basket. Won't dry up before washing like the sprays do. Your spots will be gone on the fist wash. I have used it on stuff my husband dried and it still got the stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Schaumburg, IL

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this stain stick years ago. I started using it and I've never looked back! I never have any stained clothes all thanks to this product. I hope they never stop making it. I also like how I can leave this on the clothes for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gets most every nasty stain OUT.
customer_reviews.text: Best stain remover EVER! In an easy to use container. Can't think of what I'd do without it!
customer_reviews.author: GD315

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love stain stick and it's hard to find. I can always get a good price on it on Amazon. My kids can use this to pretreat their laundry without mess and it takes out most stains without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Reliable stain removal.
customer_reviews.text: Have used for years. Works well on grease stains and around the collar grime (from sunscreen). Won't always take everything out, but what will? Very convenient to treat and leave it set for hours or even days before laundering.
customer_reviews.author: J. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Put me in your commercial!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and always have (20+ yrs). Stains ALWAYS go away. I tell others about this amazing purchase, but they dont listen and buy this product. They buy the spray, or gel. You need this specific brand and item, and you can get ALL STAINS OUT!
customer_reviews.author: Herb & Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. You can smear it on a satin and not have to worry about rushing to soak or launder your clothes. I cannot find it locally anymore, so I was thrilled to order quite a few from Amazon. Between this and liquid tide, there really has not been a stain that I could not remove.
customer_reviews.author: MARMich

customer_reviews.title: Should have just put my money in the trash can
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time, money and energy. I have to run my family's clothes through several times, applying this crud each time, to see the stain go away. I wash with vinegar and dry the stained items in the sun and this product only makes removing the drains HARDER. I'd be better off crossing my fingers and wishing the stains away. Such a waste. So disappointed. Won't ever buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: JLK ya'll

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: It works over and over. Some bad stains have needed to be washed twice and the stick applied twice, but it works better than any other stain remover I have used
customer_reviews.author: bleedlsu

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover out there
customer_reviews.text: I have used this from the store for years when it was called Stain Stick. Now I can't find it on store shelves, and it was the only product you could use and then wait to wash the item. It removed stains very well. I am happy to get this in a pack from Amazon, as I have given it to my college-age boys for their clothes, too. They don't get around to washing their soiled stuff nearly as often, and it has worked great for their clothes, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tumblewind

customer_reviews.title: Spray n Wash stick Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Ever! I order 6 at a time and give to friends. I've gotten stains out of clothes already through the washer and DRYER!!! Don't understand why this product is no longer in stores. Order on Amazon!! Quick turn-a-round. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Pre-treatment
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years, finding it the best pre-treatment for stains that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Best stain stick ever!
customer_reviews.text: Still the best stain deterrent I've ever found. I even travel with it! Love being able to pre-treat when I put it in the laundry bin, and not stress about getting it washed immediately. But it ALWAYS washes out---even the toughest grease stains, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like that is really good with all type of stains! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Stain Remover that WORKS
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY stain remover I use for 2 messy little boys. Nothing else works.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: liked the bulk packaging , I have used this successfully for years, this packaging saved me money
customer_reviews.author: Marion L. Perrott

customer_reviews.title: Best pre-wash/stain remover product, period!
customer_reviews.text: I tried for quite some time to find these because my store no longer sold them. Finally Amazon to the rescue. This is by FAR the best pre-wash product I have ever used. I have not found anything that it has not taken care of. I love that I can pre treat the fabric and wash later.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbers

customer_reviews.title: Great at Removing Stains. *******
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and I can't stop saying how Great ! it is at removing spots & old stains dirty collars. The Best at removing Stains, and I will continue to buy it again. 7 *
customer_reviews.author: Ana H.

customer_reviews.title: arrived perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it gets out every stain i apply it to, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for laundry that has to sit a day or two
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this Resolve stain stick - prefers it to any of the other products we've tried over the years,. When he's on the road, laundry may have to wait a couple of days before it gets washed and so far these sticks have prevented any number of stains from setting before he gets back home. We've used it successfully on grass, East Texas red mud, gun cleaner oils, and the usual collection of random stuff that marks up jeans & tshirts.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: you can put this on then wait up to 7 days before washing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the BEST pre-treat stain stick
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST pre-treat stain stick! My friend gave me one of hers and I will never use anything else. Love the fact that it is unscented and it continues to get out old (previously washed and dried) stains all the time. Must have for your laundry set-up!
customer_reviews.author: My Prerogative

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use both the stick and spray and find them to work efficiently. I like the stick for putting on things than cant be washed immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Warmbreezn

customer_reviews.title: It's the BEST product for pre-wash & stain removal on washable clothes
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for this for years since the grocery store stopped carrying it. It's the BEST product for pre-wash & stain removal on washable clothes.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret a single penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. You swipe it on a stain when it is fresh, or even days later...there's no need to wash the item right away. I always carry it with me when I travel. There is almost no stain that I have encountered (except rust) that it does not fix.
customer_reviews.author: Hilo Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: I love this stick
customer_reviews.text: I love this stick. I have used it for years and as long as I can get it through amazon I will continue to use it. I am always getting stains on my shirt mostly grease from something i'm cooking and this always takes it out. If it wasn't for this product I would be having to trash a lot of shirts or at least not be able to wear them out in public again :)
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Liquid seems to work better from what I can tell so far but stick form is a great convenience. Haven’t tried on really tough stains yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pretreatment for spots & stains!!
customer_reviews.text: Stores have been selling out or not carrying lately. Works really well as a pretreatment for stains before the wash. I use on stains as I toss them in the hamper, then they are good to go at wash time.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! It really works great! I use it on oil stains especially and all those kids stains!
customer_reviews.author: AndPase

customer_reviews.title: This stain remover is a staple in my laundry care ...
customer_reviews.text: This stain remover is a staple in my laundry care activity. It removes accidental makeup stains on blouses and around the back of the collar sweat marks from my husband's golf shirts, as well as for many other applications.
customer_reviews.author: Florida R

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Have used spray and bulk liquid to add to wash. Heard about stick from a friend that couldn't find anymore. Gave them one of three ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Duncan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they don't sell this anymore in local markets. Good price and Happy to find it because we think the stick is easier to direct at the spot than the available spray products
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Listing!
customer_reviews.text: I have no issue with the stain stick. My issue is that the listing said it was a "Pack of 3" but I only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zelig

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: I have looked all over in the stores for this. It is the best thing there is for pretreating stubborn stains. I finally found it here on Amazon and was delighted. Ordered enough to last me awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Shirleen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover Ever
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my family’s clothes. Awesome at getting stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: fortunately been able to use my bleach pen on those
customer_reviews.text: It really works. I let it sit on stubborn stains and they come out. Haven't tried it on blood yet, fortunately been able to use my bleach pen on those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past with excellent results. I love this stuff. It has taken out oily stains even after going through the washer and dryer once. I love that you can put it on a fresh stain and wash it a few days later. I purchased it on Amazon because I can't find it local stores anymore. I didn't do two-day delivery, but still got it in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: You can put it on and wash later without damaging the fabric. Use it when you take the clothing off, when you can remember the stain. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J. Field

customer_reviews.title: It is a shame there are only five stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this product constantly. I am prone to ruin a good shirt with a stain on the first wear. When I take my cloths off I apply Resolve and it can sit for up to a week on the fabric. 99 times out of a hundred the stain is gone and I check at the completion of the wash. If it does remain, I will treat it again (do not dry it the stain will set) and wash again.
customer_reviews.author: Abnfscoord

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works well on most stains (except dried blood & CBD oil/balm) & I love that you can leave it on for up to a week before washing!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does NOT have an odor.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and unlike Oxiclean gel, it doesn't leave a cloying, sickly perfumey disgusting smell on the clothes. In fact, I couldn't smell any odor at all. Plus it is easier to control the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to find this product in the stores anymore and it is such an ideal laundry pre-treatment. Unlike other pre-treatment products, this one can be applied and the garment can be thrown in the hamper until you are ready to do laundry. You don't have to wash it right away. Makes it much easier to remember to pre-treat the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best pre-wash item I know of
customer_reviews.text: I'm not kidding...this product takes out any kind of stain, whether it's grease, blood, crayons, ink. I could go on and on. I buy quantities at a time 'cause my family always takes one to their home to use. It's great since a person can rub on any stain before throwing in the hamper, and not have to remember to look for stains when ready to do laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Glyndynna

customer_reviews.title: Best stain stick ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stain stick for years it's the only thing that I find that works on most stains.
customer_reviews.author: David Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Different name, same great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this because you can treat your stains as you take your clothes off, then at the end of the week when we do laundry everything comes out clean! It works fantastic! We like it so well I had to find it on-line. It used to be called Spray & Wash Stain Stick.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: It works amazingly well. I tried various clothes/fabrics and sneakers, all worked well. I bought three more and using it whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Von Kyoung Kim

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a stick. I live by resolve stick and spray. Stains that used to never come out - always come out. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elise J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It can be hard to find a stick form of a laundry pre-trial, so I was glad to find this product. The price was much less than the same price from other sellers, and my husband is glad to have some to use at work, home, and vacation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bitney

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product always works on our laundry. Would purchase again ... And we have.
customer_reviews.author: S61 Driver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pre-treatment I've found... not sure why it's no longer carried in local groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Impera Magna

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I keep a stick in my bedroom to rub on any stains when undressing. I toss the garment in the wash basket and when I do laundry, the stain is gone. Best product I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The only product that really works and that I can put on stains now and let the clothes sit until laundry day. Can't find at the stores anymore but very happy that I can get it online! Used to be called Spray n Wash Stain Stick.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. It can be applied as soon as you realize you have a stain and be washed later. No more surprise missed stains when you pull the laundry out.
customer_reviews.author: Pope

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I can treat the cloths days before ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I can treat the cloths days before I do the laundry and the stains always come out.
customer_reviews.author: orlando

customer_reviews.title: Pretreat Even Days in Advance
customer_reviews.text: Only cleaner I can know that I can PRETREAT an item's stain when I first take it off, put the item in the dirty laundry, and wash a week later, coming out clean but NOT stained by the treatment. Pretreat (esp good with grease) stains disappear in the laundry even after waiting several days!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't do without this in my laundry room - works wonders on all my stains.
customer_reviews.author: d d

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. You just treat the spot and throw it in your hamper. You don't have to wash it right away and don't have to try to remember later what needs treated in your laundry basket.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fonzi

customer_reviews.title: Gets all the stains out!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time and go through a lot of it, but our clothes get clean!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Spray 'n Wash Pre-Treat Laundry Stain Stick, 3 Oz (Pack Of 3)
product_meta.description:
Size:3 Ounce (Pack of 3)Removes tough stains the 1st time. Spray and Wash with Resolve Power is specially formulated with powerful stain fighting agents that penetrate, loosen, and eliminate tough stains, such as grass, clay, chocolate, and gravy, the first time. Guaranteed. Spray and Wash with Resolve Power is safe for all colorfast washables and works in all temperatures.

AMAZON.COM


 With RESOLVE (formerly SPRAY 'N WASH) Pre-Treat Stain Stick, you can treat laundry stains when they happen and wash up to a week later. Keep one handy in your car, your office, the diaper bag, or anywhere you and your family go.


Stain Stick
Treat now, wash up to 7 days later PRE TREAT STAIN STICK
AT A GLANCE:
 * Treat now, wash later
 * Meets Transportation Security Administration carry-on size requirements
 * Works in all temperatures
 * Maybe be used with other laundry additives
 * Safe for all colorfast washables

CARRY-ON-SIZE STAIN REMOVER IDEAL FOR TRAVEL
 The RESOLVE Stain Stick is perfect for traveling, since it meets Transportation Security Administration carry-on size requirements. Treat while on vacation and wash upon your return home.

PHOSPHATE-FREE FORMULA ELIMINATES TOUGH STAINS
 With a 75 percent greater enzyme level, this stain remover helps prevents tough stains from setting. It works great on tough stains, including bacon grease, butter, French fry grease, grass, hamburger grease, makeup, motor oil, spaghetti sauce, tea, and vegetable oil. The formula contains no phosphates and offers great stain-removing results in cold water. The bottle is made out of 25 percent post-consumer recycled plastic.

DIRECTIONS FOR EVERY WASH LOAD:
1. Apply to the stain, covering it completely.
2. Rub into stain.
3. Wait one minute or up to a week before washing. 4. Wash according to care label instructions in the warmest water recommended.WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Three 3-ounce RESOLVE (formerly SPRAY 'N WASH) Stain Remover Sticks.

HINTS FROM THE EXPERTS:
May be used with other laundry additives. Safe for all colorfast washables. Works in all temperatures. Not recommended for use on khaki, fluorescent clothing, or washable silk. Do not treat garment while wearing. Certain stains like rust, dried paint, permanent ink, or bleach damage may be impossible to remove by any laundry stain remover.Pre-TreatOn-the-GoIn WashFor the stains you can seeDon't have time to wash now? Treat now, and wash up to 7 days laterFor the stains you may have missed
